name: Flashcard Dungeon
description:
Flashcard Dungeon is intended to be a fun way to reinforce learning languages. Pick a difficulty, your preferred interface language, and the two languages for which you want to see flashcards, and enter the dungeon!

Supported languages:

  • English
  • Spanish
  • French
  • German
  • Dutch
  • Catalan
  • Haitian Creole

Music, programming, and design by Benjamin Nolan (TwoWholeWorms).

Pixellari font graciously provided by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante.

Art assets are mostly from the Humble 2D Game Dev bundle.

----

Known issues:

  • Button text is waaaaaay too big in full-screen mode.
  • Back to Menu button text doesn't translate.
  • A blank button occasionally appears in the flashcards.
